Articles.Content:
DESTINY

[image source: http://spinthecat.blogspot.co.uk/2011/09/building-3d-destiny-model-for-stargate.html]

This project has only just begun so please be patient

This is where i will post the main updates and progress on the mod, which was inspired the the nostromo add-on and will hopefully be just as good, if not better

So far we have 2 modellers (technically 1 and a bit) and a programmer so any experienced modellers will be welcomed aswell as anyone who has experience with balancing ksp parts.

I will keep you all posted
Hmmn, I'll reserve judgment until I can actually play around with it.
one of my favorite ships in the Stragate series. nice to see it being made in ksp, will play with it when it is finished

one of my favorite ships in the Stragate series. nice to see it being made in ksp, will play with it when it is finished

Whats "Stragate", Hasshak?

And I'd be happy simply with other Stargate ships, like 302's, 303's, Death gliders, Al'Kesh, Ha'tak, etc etc etc.

(Look up the Goa'uld language if you want to know what "Hasshak " means)
Ok I signed up to this forum just to comment on this, any luck or progress yet? Id love to be able to fly anything stargate in kerbal (that didnt look like a flying block)
I like this mod idea- I just wish there was a mod that let you do FTL travel.

My avatar, sir!!!

keep plugging away at it. Even if one must use a save edit to get it in space, I will use it!
